title: Merck KGAA | Senior Software Engineer, Backend | Bengaluru, Remote
content:
* Education: B Tech in top 5 IITs
* Years of Experience: 2.5
* Prior Experience: Biggest indian conglomerate with 18L annual compensation.
* Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
* Company: Merck Group's Indian subsidiary
* Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
* Location: Bengaluru, though depending on the team highly Remote
* Salary: 26,50,000 INR
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1,60,000 + costs incurred.
* Stock bonus: 0
* Bonus: 12 % = 2,50,000
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 30.5 L
* Benefits: 
	* Creche
	* Office food subsidy
	* Cab service in the city,
	* a lot of leaves, 12 fixed (with choice of days) + 30 casual + 10 sick  + 5 bereavement
	* health insurance: Same sex partner coverable as dependent.
	* Overtime pay
	* No strict working hours
	* Caretakers' concessions in terms of hours, remote and work resposibilities.
	* inclusive environment (women, people with disabilities, neurodivergents, LGBT)
	* sustainable product development* (seen as advertised)
	* leadership communication about roadmap, policies etc despite being a huge organisation.
* Other details: I found no criticism of the company online in forums like glassdoor, fishbowl. Everyone praised the WLB. It's an underrated gem of a company.
* Negotiation: They offered me more than I asked for (24 Total -> 28L)
* Interview: One round of resume discussion.

```
Deferred Bonus - INR 3,00,000
```

```
1st Year pay (Base+Stocks+Bonus) - 15.25 + 23/4 + 6 ~ INR 27L
2nd Year - 15.25+1.525+23/4 ~ INR 22.5L
```

### Relocation
```
2 months of Base pay ~ INR 2.5L
14 Days stay
One way flight ( New Hire + Family )
```

### Other Benefits
```
Wellness reimbursement ~ INR 50,000
Free Food, Gym, transit bus and many more...
```

content:
**Education:**
B.Tech CSE, Tier 2 private college.

**Years of Experience:** 6 month internship at a FAANGMULA company
**Date of the Offer:** March 2024
**Company**: Flipkart 
**Title/Level:** Software Development Engineer 1
**Location:** Bangalore, India

**TOTAL CTC:** 32,57,000

**Salary:** 18 lakhs base
**Relocation:** 40k cash + 40k in travel/hotel allowances
**Signing Bonus:** 3 lakhs - with first month salary
**Retention Bonus:** 3 lakhs - at start of second year
**Stock bonus:** 5.07 lakhs ESOPs - evenly over 4 years
**Variable Pay:** 1.8 lakhs
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock) for year 1:** ~24.8 lakhs 
**Benefits:** 1.69 lakhs (2200 meal card, insurance, wellness, retirement, etc.)

**Other details:** 
Signing and Retention bonuses have a clawback period of 2 and 1 years resp.
Flipkart hasn't IPOed so take the stock values with a grain of salt.
Was pleasantly surprised with Flipkart's compensation structure. It is only about a lakh lower than the FAANGMULA company I interned at, so pretty much top of the range for fresh graduates. (Even though the CTC looks much higher at FAANG due to backloaded stocks, the amount you get is same in first 2 years)

**Interview Experience:** [Same hiring drive and process as this post](https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-question/4839315/flipkart-sde-1-interview-experience-2024).
